Title: Crafting Orders: Engineering
Description:
So... you are an engineer, hmm?

You should meet Machinist Arhdas in the Forgegrounds. I will mark his location on your map. 

Arhdas has an engineering table where you can review, craft, and deliver work orders from public lists and personal contacts like friends and guilds. If you are lucky, you might come across an order from a renowned person which offers some extra rewards--or so I hear.
ObjectivesText: Find Arhdas in the Forgegrounds and use his engineering table.
